definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)

sentences.english: Into the camp, blood tests found Lee's living with HIV in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 進勞教所時，抽血化驗查出李的血液中攜帶艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: On one occasion, I was given the task of baptizing an aborted child that did not make it through labor.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，我的任務是孩子流產了洗禮，不靠勞教人員。

sentences.english: I didn't realize China was using labor camps to "re-educate" people.
sentences.chinese: 過去我沒有發現中國用勞教所來“重新教育”人們。

sentences.english: Does the system work in re-educating convicts?
sentences.chinese: 勞教所到底有沒有對罪犯進行再教育呢？

sentences.english: North Korea says an American citizen sentenced to 15 years of hard labor has begun serving his sentence.
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮說，被判15年勞教的一名美國公民開始服刑。

sentences.english: The system in China is rife with abuse.
sentences.chinese: 中國的勞教制度充斥着虐待。

sentences.english: To that end re-education sites on the Li measures taken for medical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 勞教場所爲此對李採取了保外就醫措施。

sentences.english: Ma Huaide, a professor at China University of Political Science and Law, likened the laojiao system to an ax.
sentences.chinese: 中國政法大學的馬懷德教授把勞教制度比喻爲斧頭。

sentences.english: Officer Patao mentioned the inmate crews that work for Caltrans (the California Department of Transportation).
sentences.chinese: 帕塔奧獄長提到了那些爲加州交通局工作的勞教犯。

sentences.english: The fourth part is the status quo and defects of legal aid.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是勞教場所法律援助工作的現狀與缺陷。

sentences.english: This road is the product of inmates into production among government procurement.
sentences.chinese: 這條路就是將勞教生產產品納入政府採購之中。

sentences.english: Home is the girl's prison and the woman's workhouse .
sentences.chinese: 家是女孩的監獄，女人的勞教所。

sentences.english: Cattle mouth Longhua Reservoir in Bao'an District of Shenzhen city near the second reformatory.
sentences.chinese: 牛嘴水庫位於寶安區龍華深圳市第二勞教所附近。

sentences.english: As the justice system collapsed, local leaders sent millions to labor and reeducation camps.
sentences.chinese: 由於司法體系崩潰，地方領導把數百萬人送進勞教營。

sentences.english: Ryan: Can you help me please?
To tell the truth, who would like to go to the labor reeducation camp?
sentences.chinese: 說句心裏話，有誰願意成爲一名勞教人員呢？

definition: (of an official) corrupt and negligent of his duty
to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office

(neologism c. 2013) organized disruption of healthcare facilities or verbal and physical abuse of medical staff, by an aggrieved patient or proxies such as family members or hired thugs, typically aimed at obtaining compensation
